nodes.text: An Inquiry on Surviving Slavery Practices in the Aftermath of the Second Galactic Civil War

An Inquiry on Surviving Slavery Practices in the Aftermath of the Second Galactic Civil War was a report filed by Jedi Knight Sothais Saar sometime in 43.5 ABY, regarding the subject of slavery in regions not controlled by the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances. After briefing the Jedi Order's High Council with his report, Saar announced that he would have an annotated and cross-indexed version available in three weeks.
